item.title: APU Start Transformer Rectifier Unit – APU Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided APU is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional deferral required – Auxiliary Power Unit (APU).
An auto-generated ACARS message requesting an in flight APU start should be disregarded.

placard.para: Placard APU Control Panel "APU TRU INOP" as appropriate and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
